response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present our exclusive product to you. This item holds immense value for us and we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this product to you at a special price of $1,250,000. Given its significance and the benefits it offers, we are confident that this price reflects both the quality and the value it brings to you.

Please let us know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. We are here to assist you every step of the way and ensure a smooth transaction.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1250000}
